title: Advance Australia
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Department of the Interior
brief_description: An interpretation of the Australian way of life, set against a background showing phases of Australia’s land, cities, natural resources, primary and secondary industries, arts, sports, recreations, and potentialities. Suitable for secondary school level.
